keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit done and move on
£33.9 billion extra for the NHS, 40 new hospitals across the country
More funding for every pupil in every school
Gigabit broadband for the whole country, £3.6 billion to help towns invest and attract new businesses

leaflet.personalStatement: Hertsmere is my home patch. I grew up around Radlett...

politicalExperience.achievements: I have sought to preserve and enhance this. I have used my skills and experiences to give you a strong voice nationally and stand up for your interests.
